name: Swashbuckler (QuinnHecker)
description:
2D sword-fighting arcade challenge. 

Kill enemies to gain points; take out tougher enemies and execute skillful kills for bonus points.

Controls:

  • WASD: move
  • Cursor: control reticle/facing-direction
  • Left Mouse-Button: slash
  • Middle Mouse-Button: lunging-stab
  • Right Mouse-Button: deflect
  • Space: kick
  • R: reset

Inspired by Hotline Miami; I wanted to play a game with a similar movement/control system, just with more of a melee focus, so I made this. It is a solo project, made in GameMaker Studio 2, using GML scripting.

I created the designs, code, and assets.
